Miscellaneous Highlights: The Heat remain undefeated when Alec Burks is utilized as a major part of the rotation, going 4-0 when he plays at least 25 minutes.
Others: Bam Adebayo had his first good game of 2025, finishing with 19 points, nine rebounds, and five assists on 64.3 percent shooting.
Jaime Jaquez Jr. has had back-to-back good games in the starting lineup, finishing with 18 points, five rebounds, and one assist on 58.3 percent shooting.
Nikola Jovic continues his breakout season with another dominant performance, finishing with 20 points, six rebounds, and four assists on 47.1 percent shooting.
